gui
Class PSGMGui

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              gui.DatabaseAccessGUI
                  gui.PSGMGui
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class PSGMGui
extends DatabaseAccessGUI

Simple GUI for choosing two database entries and then execute the matching algorithm. The two objects to be matched as well as the matching parameters (weight factor alpha and the number of sampling points) can be chosen. The name of the database is passed by command line parameters. The database has to be inside the database folder.

See Also:
Serialized Form
